clarke_review.primary_message: Pytest collection fails due to a malformed f-string in a test; fix the f-string to allow collection to proceed.

explicit_actions_for_ada.contents: assert result.get("error", dict()).get("code") == "EXPECTED_ERROR_CODE_FROM_SPEC", f"expected 'EXPECTED_ERROR_CODE_FROM_SPEC' got {result.get('error', dict()).get('code')} for 7.2.2.1"
